sections.Biography:
===Background===
He is a son of a goatherd in [[Meereen]].
===[[Season 4]]===
One day he is with his [[Goatherd (The Laws of Gods and Men)|father]] tending the goats on a hill near Meereen and throwing rocks, when suddenly [[Drogon]] appears and flies past him, burning a number of goats and taking one to eat.<ref>"[[The Laws of Gods and Men]]"</ref>
